name: bummer-blogher-nashville-canceled
title: Bummer: BlogHer Nashville Canceled
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
About a week ago, BlogHer emailed to let us know that they’d be canceling the Southern leg of their ReachOut Tour. This unfortunately includes Nashville. We kept it pretty under wraps, but we were supposed to be speaking on a panel of entertainment bloggers. However hilarious that would have been, we guess the world will just have to wait for our first public appearance. C’est la vie.
